Header.Name: nuBridges
Header.Subject: New EDI ID for TrueCommerce AS2 Interconnect
Header.Suggestion: In the VAN Setup task, add a note "Emailed nuBridges" and mark it as completed.

ScribTemplate.Template: NuBridges -[$$:BR][$$:BR]Please verify that ID [$:CUSTOMER_QUALIFIER]/[$:CUSTOMER_EDI_ID] is added to TrueCommerce AS2 interconnect for [$:CUSTOMER_NAME].[$$:BR][$$:BR]If not already listed, please add. Once completed, please advise via email.[$$:BR][$$:BR]Thank You!
